add.name: ipForwDatagrams
add.legend: Number of input datagrams for which this entity was not their final IP destination

add.name: ipInDelivers
add.legend: Number of input datagrams successfully delivered

add.name: ipOutRequests
add.legend: Number of IP datagrams requests for transmission.

add.name: ipReasmOKs
add.legend: Number of IP datagrams successfully re-assembled

add.name: ipFragOKs
add.legend: Number of IP datagrams that have been successfully fragmented

add.name: ipFragCreates
add.legend: Number of IP datagram fragments that have been generated as a result of fragmentation at this entity
